**still experimental**

`summarytrees` can transform into an `htmlwidget` quickly and easily.  Here is just a simple example.  Once it is a `htmlwidget`, we can include it in a `rmarkdown` vignette, in `Shiny`, as a standalone web page.

```{r}
library(summarytrees)

json <- paste0(
  readLines("http://www2.research.att.com/~kshirley/jsm2015/data.json")
  ,collapse="\n"
)

summarytrees_htmlwidget(json, height = 600, width = 800)

```
